thread.title: Trump’s Latest Approval Ratings Released, LOOK What People Instantly Notice…
thread.title_full: Trump’s Latest Approval Ratings Released, LOOK What People Instantly Notice…

author: John S. Roberts
title: Trump’s Latest Approval Ratings Released, LOOK What People Instantly Notice…
text:
President Donald Trump’s approval ratings have not been great to start. 
In fact, he is the first commander-in-chief to come into office with an approval rating below 50% , per Gallup. 
Now, the tides have turned. 
Just over two weeks in the Oval Office, Trump has hit the 50% mark. 
Should be higher by now. 
From Daily Caller : 
According to a recent poll from Reuters , 50 percent of registered voters approve of Trump’s presidency so far, while 47 percent disapprove. Nearly three percent of the 5,800 registered voters surveyed had mixed feelings. 
The bottom line is that people who opposed (or still oppose) the president are starting to understand his vision more clearly. 
They can see that 45 wants to put America – and Americans – first, no matter what. 
The temporary travel ban may have been poorly executed (probably should’ve waited until Sen. Jeff Sessions was confirmed as attorney general), but Trump is making it a point to get things done quickly. 
America voted for change and they want it now. 
#MAGA
